grader 0.1.0
  • Reference

Random praise and encouragement

Source: R/praise.R
praise.Rd

Generate a random praise or encouragement phrase. This can be used in conjunction with glue::glue to generate praise or encouragement within feedback to users.

random_praise()

random_encourage()

Examples

replicate(5, glue::glue("Random praise: {random_praise()}"))
#> [1] "Random praise: Beautiful!"           
#> [2] "Random praise: What first-rate work!"
#> [3] "Random praise: Super job!"           
#> [4] "Random praise: Cool job!"            
#> [5] "Random praise: Absolutely fabulous!" 
replicate(5, glue::glue("Random encouragement: {random_encourage()}"))
#> [1] "Random encouragement: Don't give up now, try it one more time."
#> [2] "Random encouragement: Don't give up now, try it one more time."
#> [3] "Random encouragement: Let's try it again."                     
#> [4] "Random encouragement: Try it again. You get better each time." 
#> [5] "Random encouragement: Try it again. You get better each time."
